column1: Time as all the Senior Presiding Officers have departed to their Polling Stations.
All the poll staff have reported to their polling station according to report received from AROO (Zones).
Poll has commenced at all the polling stations at the specified time at 7.00 a.m. according to the reports received from AROO (Zone).
Counting of votes of all the counting centres have commenced at
Date and time of completion of Court
